SYDE 312: Applied Linear Algebra

Winter 2025, University of Waterloo

Instructor: Harish Prakash

About

Hi there! This course offered by the University of Waterloo, explores the practical applications of linear algebra through hands-on projects. Students work in teams to create engaging educational content using MANIM, implementing unintuitive linear algebra concepts in creative and accessible ways. Below are some of the outstanding projects from our students.

Course Projects
